verses.verse: כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD שַׁ֜עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar The gate הֶחָצֵ֤ר <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer court הַפְּנִימִית֙ <S%H6442><s%> hap-pe-ni-Mit of the inner הַפֹּנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> hap-po-Neh that looketh קָדִ֔ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim, toward the east יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become סָג֔וּר <S%H5462><s%> sa-Gur, shall be shut שֵׁ֖שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> She-shet the six יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei days הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H4639><s%> ham-ma-'a-Seh; working וּבְי֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-ve-Yom and in the day הַשַּׁבָּת֙ <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat the sabbath יִפָּתֵ֔חַ <S%H6605><s%> yip-pa-Te-ach, it shall be opened וּבְי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-ve-Yom the day הַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ha-Cho-desh of the new moon יִפָּתֵֽחַ׃ <S%H6605><s%> yip-pa-Te-ach. it shall be opened

וּבָ֣א <S%H935><s%> u-Va shall enter הַנָּשִׂ֡יא <S%H5387><s%> han-na-Si And the prince דֶּרֶךְ֩ <S%H1870><s%> de-reCh by the way אוּלָ֨ם <S%H197><s%> 'u-Lam of the porch הַשַּׁ֜עַר <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar of [that] gate מִח֗וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz, without וְעָמַד֙ <S%H5975><s%> ve-'a-Mad and shall stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by מְזוּזַ֣ת <S%H4201><s%> me-zu-Zat by the post הַשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar, of the gate וְעָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Su shall prepare הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim, and the priests אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֽוֹלָתוֹ֙ <S%H5930><s%> o-la-To his burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁלָמָ֔יו <S%H8002><s%> she-la-Mav, and his peace offerings וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוָ֛ה <S%H7812><s%> ve-hish-ta-cha-Vah and he shall worship עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- at מִפְתַּ֥ן <S%H4670><s%> mif-Tan at the threshold הַשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar of the gate וְיָצָ֑א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza; then he shall go forth וְהַשַּׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> ve-hash-Sha-'ar but the gate לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יִסָּגֵ֖ר <S%H5462><s%> yis-sa-Ger shall not be shut עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> ha-'A-rev. until the evening

וְהִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <S%H7812><s%> ve-hish-ta-cha-Vu shall worship עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- Likewise the people הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the land פֶּ֚תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach at the door הַשַּׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar of this gate הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he בַּשַּׁבָּת֖וֹת <S%H7676><s%> bash-shab-ba-Tot in the sabbaths וּבֶחֳדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2320><s%> u-ve-cho-da-Shim; and in the new moons לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וְהָ֣עֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> ve-Ha-'o-Lah, And the burnt offering אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יַקְרִ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> yak-Riv shall offer הַנָּשִׂ֖יא <S%H5387><s%> han-na-Si that the prince לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom day הַשַּׁבָּ֗ת <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat, in the sabbath שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <S%H8337><s%> shish-Shah [shall be] six כְבָשִׂ֛ים <S%H3532><s%> che-va-Sim lambs תְּמִימִ֖ם <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim without blemish וְאַ֥יִל <S%H352><s%> ve-'A-yil and a ram תָּמִֽים׃ <S%H8549><s%> ta-Mim. without blemish

וּמִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> u-min-Chah And the meat offering אֵיפָ֣ה <S%H374><s%> 'ei-Fah [shall be] an ephah לָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> la-'A-yil, for a ram וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֥ים <S%H3532><s%> ve-lak-ke-va-Sim for the lambs מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah and the meat offering מַתַּ֣ת <S%H4991><s%> mat-Tat to give יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do; as he shall be able וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> ve-She-men of oil הִ֥ין <S%H1969><s%> hin and an hin לָאֵיפָֽה׃ <S%H374><s%> la-'ei-Fah. to an ephah

וּבְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-ve-Yom And in the day הַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ha-Cho-desh, of the new moon פַּ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> par bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- a young בָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar bull תְּמִימִ֑ם <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim; without blemish וְשֵׁ֧שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> ve-She-shet and six כְּבָשִׂ֛ם <S%H3532><s%> ke-va-Sim lambs וָאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> va-'A-yil and a ram תְּמִימִ֥ם <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim they shall be without blemish יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu. become

וְאֵיפָ֨ה <S%H374><s%> ve-'ei-Fah an ephah לַפָּ֜ר <S%H6499><s%> lap-Par for a bullock וְאֵיפָ֤ה <S%H374><s%> ve-'ei-Fah and an ephah לָאַ֙יִל֙ <S%H352><s%> la-'A-yil for a ram יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh And he shall prepare מִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah, a meat offering וְלַ֨כְּבָשִׂ֔ים <S%H3532><s%> ve-Lak-ke-va-Sim, and for the lambs כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after תַּשִּׂ֖יג <S%H5381><s%> tas-Sig shall attain יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do; according as his hand וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> ve-She-men of oil הִ֥ין <S%H1969><s%> hin unto and an hin לָאֵיפָֽה׃ <S%H374><s%> la-'ei-Fah. to an ephah

וּבְב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> u-ve-Vo shall enter הַנָּשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> han-na-Si; And when the prince דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech in by the way אוּלָ֤ם <S%H197><s%> 'u-Lam of the porch הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar of [that] gate יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo, he shall go וּבְדַרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H1870><s%> u-ve-dar-Ko by the way יֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze. and he shall go forth

וּבְב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> u-ve-Vo shall come עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- But when the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the land לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בַּמּֽוֹעֲדִים֒ <S%H4150><s%> bam-mo-'a-Dim in the solemn feasts הַבָּ֡א <S%H935><s%> hab-Ba he that entereth דֶּרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> de-rech- in by the way שַׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate צָפ֜וֹן <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon of the north לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֗ת <S%H7812><s%> le-hish-ta-cha-Vot, to worship יֵצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze shall go out דֶּרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> de-rech- by the way שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate נֶ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> Ne-gev, of the south וְהַבָּא֙ <S%H935><s%> ve-hab-Ba and he that entereth דֶּרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> de-rech- by the way שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate נֶ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> Ne-gev, of the south יֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze shall go forth דֶּרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> de-rech- by the way שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate צָפ֑וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah; of the north לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo No יָשׁ֗וּב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv, he shall not return דֶּ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech by the way הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar of the gate אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba whereby he came in ב֔וֹ <S%H99999><s%> vo, כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki over נִכְח֖וֹ <S%H5226><s%> nich-Cho over against; יֵצְאוּ ye-tze-'u כיֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze. shall go ק

וְֽהַנָּשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> ve-han-na-Si; And the prince בְּתוֹכָ֤ם <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cham in the midst בְּבוֹאָם֙ <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'Am of them when they go in יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo, shall go in וּבְצֵאתָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> u-ve-tze-Tam and when they go forth יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze-'u. shall go forth

וּבַחַגִּ֣ים <S%H2282><s%> u-va-chag-Gim And in the feasts וּבַמּוֹעֲדִ֗ים <S%H4150><s%> u-vam-mo-'a-Dim, and in the solemnities תִּהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become הַמִּנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> ham-min-Chah the meat offering אֵיפָ֤ה <S%H374><s%> 'ei-Fah shall be an ephah לַפָּר֙ <S%H6499><s%> lap-Par to a bullock וְאֵיפָ֣ה <S%H374><s%> ve-'ei-Fah and an ephah לָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> la-'A-yil, to a ram וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֖ים <S%H3532><s%> ve-lak-ke-va-Sim and to the lambs מַתַּ֣ת <S%H4991><s%> mat-Tat to give יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do; as he is able וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> ve-She-men of oil הִ֥ין <S%H1969><s%> hin and an hin לָאֵיפָֽה׃ <S%H374><s%> la-'ei-Fah. to an ephah ס sa-Mek

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- When יַעֲשֶׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh shall prepare הַנָּשִׂ֨יא <S%H5387><s%> han-na-Si Now when the prince נְדָבָ֜ה <S%H5071><s%> ne-da-Vah a voluntary עוֹלָ֣ה <S%H5930><s%> o-Lah burnt offering אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or שְׁלָמִים֮ <S%H8002><s%> she-la-Mim or peace offerings נְדָבָ֣ה <S%H5071><s%> ne-da-Vah voluntarily לַֽיהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD וּפָ֣תַֽח <S%H6605><s%> u-Fa-tach [one] shall then open ל֗וֹ lo, אֶת <S%H853><s%> 'et הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar him the gate הַפֹּנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> hap-po-Neh that looketh קָדִ֔ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim, toward the east וְעָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Sah and he shall prepare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֹֽלָתוֹ֙ <S%H5930><s%> o-la-To his burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁלָמָ֔יו <S%H8002><s%> she-la-Mav, and his peace offerings כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh as he did בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom day הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat; on the sabbath וְיָצָ֛א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza then he shall go forth וְסָגַ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> ve-sa-Gar [one] shall shut אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar the gate אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei and after צֵאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3318><s%> tze-To. his going forth

וְכֶ֨בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> ve-Che-ves [of] a lamb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- of the first שְׁנָת֜וֹ <S%H8141><s%> she-na-To year תָּמִ֗ים <S%H8549><s%> ta-Mim, without blemish תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh prepare עוֹלָ֛ה <S%H5930><s%> o-Lah a burnt offering לַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> lai-Yom Thou shalt daily לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker it every בַּבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker morning תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh thou shalt prepare אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וּמִנְחָה֩ <S%H4503><s%> u-min-Chah a meat offering תַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh And thou shalt prepare עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav with בַּבֹּ֤קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker for it every morning בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker morning שִׁשִּׁ֣ית <S%H8345><s%> shish-Shit the sixth part הָֽאֵיפָ֔ה <S%H374><s%> ha-'ei-Fah, of an ephah וְשֶׁ֛מֶן <S%H8081><s%> ve-She-men of oil שְׁלִישִׁ֥ית <S%H7992><s%> she-li-Shit and the third part הַהִ֖ין <S%H1969><s%> ha-Hin of an hin לָרֹ֣ס <S%H7450><s%> la-Ros to temper with אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַסֹּ֑לֶת <S%H5560><s%> has-So-let; the fine flour מִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah a meat offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD חֻקּ֥וֹת <S%H2708><s%> chuk-Kot ordinance עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam by a perpetual תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid. continually

וַעָשׂוּ va-'a-su כיַעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Su accomplish קאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֶּ֧בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> hak-Ke-ves the lamb וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמִּנְחָ֛ה <S%H4503><s%> ham-min-Chah and the meat offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> hash-She-men and the oil בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker every morning בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker; morning עוֹלַ֖ת <S%H5930><s%> o-Lat burnt offering תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid.
